channel.title: How to get free gum or candy from wrigley
channel.description:
this is 100% going to work
If you do not know what the wrigley company is Its a candy production company Here are some of its products [IMG]http://i499.photobucket.com/albums/rr359/xmand/wrigley-gum-products.png[/img]
Step one go to [url=http://Wrigley.com]Wrigley.com[/url]
step two: click on the "contact us" button on the top right corner on the right hand side of the website you should see something like this [IMG]http://i499.photobucket.com/albums/rr359/xmand/wrigley.jpg[/img]
You need to click on "contact form"
step three:
Fill out the form (*don't be afraid to share your address and name they are a big company they Won't share it with anyone")
You need to put your first name last name address city state zip country and email
don't bother to even put your phone number
dont bother to put the brand/flavor or the mfg/upc codes
Step four: Write in a "[u]fake[/u]" Complaint In the Questions/comments box such as
Dear, wrigley company. I recently purchased 1 pack of your eclipse freshmint tropical gum, When I went to open it It only had 6 out of 9 peices in the package. I am very upset with this purchase and am looking for a replacement, If you need to contact me please do so by email.
the more upset you sound the more they will want to send you free products or a coupon for a free product. The reason they will send you A free product or coupon is because they want you to stay a fan of their products.
This is similar to the complaint I used But be creative with it you need to make them Believe you, In around 24 hours check your email, you should have something from "PR@wrigley.com" With the subject "in responce to your website comments ref #888j4j4nn4" The will tell you if they are sending you a coupon or not Usualy they will. "Note if you don't get anything from wrigley in you email give it a few days, they are a bussy company. sunday through friday anytime of the day.
I did this a few days ago because a friend referd me to it I got my coupon in about 5-10 buisness days.
When you get your coupons in the mail just go to any grocery store or drug store that sells wrigley products. and pick your product and go to the cashier and hand them the coupon and you got your self free candy/gum
Try it it works 100%
("Note if you send multiple complaints they will most likely not send you anything so just do it once or twice")
I thought I'd share this with fellow moparscapers:P
Need tips? pm me and i'll give you some pointers.

item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Dear Faggots,

Thank you for posting this wonderful tutorial on the Moparisthebest.com forums.

In order for the greater good of this forum to remain sane, we would like to remind you that we are not all 12 years old and we do not give a shit about two (2) packets of free gum obtained by lying to a company. While many of us support ripping off these large corporations, we would like to urge you to fuck off and stop posting retarded threads.

Technically this topic is in the scope of the forum, but we would like to remind you that you are obviously underage and should be removed from the premises for breaking the rules that you agreed to upon sign up, and also the rules of the interwebs.

Sincerely,

Cheese_Police
Moparisthebest Anti-faggotry Representative

item.title: How to get free gum or candy from wrigley
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Dear Taylor,

Thank you for contacting the Wrigley Company to request information. We sincerely appreciate your interest in our Company and brands.

In order for us to be able to send any type of compensation, we are going to need to get some additional information or a more detailed explanation from you. We need the best by date and lot number off the side of the package, the store you purchased the product from, and the size of the package you purchased.

If you could please provide us with more thorough details, we would be happy to answer your question. You may either respond to this message or contact us via phone by calling us at 1-800-WRIGLEY Monday through Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

Thank you again for reaching out to us with your request.

Sincerely,

Molly Flay
Consumer Affairs Representative

Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm >.>

Read full topic

item.title: How to get free gum or candy from wrigley
item.description:
@5111 wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:25, topic:315274”][quote author=5 link=topic=411688.msg3052764#msg3052764 date=1260211351]
My camera is messing up right now but here is what my letter says

[quote]Wm. WRIGLEY Jr. Company

P.O BOX 3900
PEORIA, ILLINOIS 61612
Telephone 1-800-WRIGLEY

customersname
customers address

Dear (namehere)

Thanks again for contacting us with your comments

Please accept the enclosed complimentary coupons with our best in hopes that you will remain a loyal wrigley fan.

sincerely

MELLISA KEPPLE

Cunsumer affairs represebtative

000594349b

enclosures:
1#10 envelope
2 Coupons[/quote]

The coupon states on it

[quote]THIS COUPONS GOOD FOR ONE FREE PACKAGE OF ANY WRIGLEY GUM OR MINT PRODUCT

dealer wrigley will rimburse the retail value upto 1.50$ (plux applicable taxes), on purchase of item specified. other use constitues fraud redeem per coupon policy and mail to: wrigley canada, p.o box 3000, st. john,Nb, e2l 4l3. limit one coupon per purchase. coupon expires june 2010 [/quote]
[/quote]
It looks like you’ve got a few misspellings there.[/quote]

ah well im not perfect

item.title: How to get free gum or candy from wrigley
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

bootnecklad:

pics or it didnt happen…

I’ve already eaten the gum, I’ll get a pic of the letter when I can, but for now I’ll just type it up.

Dear Mr -insert my surname-

Thank you for your further email and we are sorry to hear that you have disposed of the packet of Five chewing gum.

As explained naturally we are particularly interested to know whether this has happened in the manufacturing process but without a sample of the chewing gum we cannot comment fairly, as on the rare occasion when a complaint of this nature is received the product needs to be assessed by our Quality Assurance Department. Should you encounter any further problems with our products we would be grateful if you would return these to us for examination and to help us remedy any further problems.

The Wrigley company goes to great lengths to try to ensure that every pack reaches our customers in the best possible condition. We are therefore grateful to you for bringing the matter to our attention as this will serve to encourage us to to remain continually vigilant in order to ensure that we satisfy our customers with only the best possible products.

as a mark of our appreciation we are pleased to enclose a couple of packets of Five chewing gum which we hope you will find to your satisfaction.

Yours sincerely,

-insert signature-

Beverly Brown (Ms)
Office & Consumer Services Manager

Read full topic
